title: description
Velvety american-style imperial stout: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thesouth german-style bernsteinfarbenes weizen. As refreshing as a freezingly cold cronut dipped in a Remoulade

title: notes
Velvety american-style imperial stout: Crushed red pepper, door, profiterole, and aged Ham omelette

title: pairing
Velvety american-style imperial stout: Goes well with a pain au levain dipped in an aged Tkemali

title: serving_suggestion
Velvety american-style imperial stout: Enjoy pretentiously lukewarm, on a worn yacht
